models.name: Corolla
models.shortDescription: A reliable and fuel-efficient sedan.
models.longDescription: The Toyota Corolla is a compact sedan known for its exceptional reliability and fuel efficiency. It offers a comfortable ride and a spacious interior, making it an excellent choice for daily commuting.

models.name: Camry
models.shortDescription: Spacious and comfortable family sedan.
models.longDescription: The Toyota Camry is a midsize sedan that combines spaciousness and comfort. It's designed for families looking for a reliable and comfortable car for daily use.

models.name: RAV4
models.shortDescription: A popular and versatile SUV.
models.longDescription: The Toyota RAV4 is a highly popular SUV known for its versatility. It's a great choice for those who need a vehicle that can handle a wide range of activities, from city driving to outdoor adventures.

models.name: Highlander
models.shortDescription: Family-friendly SUV with advanced features.
models.longDescription: The Toyota Highlander is a family-friendly SUV with advanced features and a spacious interior. It's perfect for families on the go, offering comfort and safety for all passengers.

models.name: Prius
models.shortDescription: An eco-friendly hybrid car with great mileage.
models.longDescription: The Toyota Prius is a well-known hybrid car that sets the standard for fuel efficiency and environmental friendliness. It's the perfect choice for eco-conscious drivers seeking excellent gas mileage.

models.name: Tundra
models.shortDescription: A powerful and rugged full-size pickup truck.
models.longDescription: The Toyota Tundra is a powerful and rugged full-size pickup truck, ideal for towing and heavy-duty work. It offers impressive capabilities and a comfortable interior for both work and play.

models.name: Civic
models.shortDescription: Sporty and efficient compact sedan.

models.name: Accord
